html:
Roaming and Interconnect

NETSCOUT’s best-in-class roaming solutions enable service providers to steer outbound roamers to the best and most profitable carrier services, while also maximizing inbound roaming minutes of use (MOU) from visiting subscribers. Our solutions can effectively report on and address signaling traffic related to roaming hub services and SMS transmissions.
Product Group

LTE and VoLTE Monitoring

Your LTE and Wi-Fi networks are the foundation for your next-generation, digital voice, and data services by providing scalability, increased capacity, and speed.
Product Group

IMS Monitoring

Your customers rely upon the delivery of data-driven services such as VoLTE and VoWiFi. IMS is at the heart of IP service delivery and provides IP media and supporting functions such as AAA, policy, profile management and location updates.
Product Group

Service Provider Data Enablement

NETSCOUT helps you tackle issues associated with Big Data – volume, variety and velocity – enabling you to derive lucrative insights into usage behavior and to improve customer experience.
Product Group

Core Network Assurance

Customer expectations are rising daily. At the same time, networks are becoming more complex. Issues in the core network have a compounding effect on the entire infrastructure. Service providers are faced with the challenge of having the right tools in place to react quickly to subscriber problems and plan for future success.
Product Group

Building Trust to Build Business

Basic page

Network Packet Brokers for Security Visibility

In today’s rapidly changing IT world, security is top of mind. You need solutions you can count on to ensure that your services and applications are reliable and secure - and can adapt with your ever-changing environment.
Product Group

Wi-Fi Monitoring Systems

Whether you operate physical appliances to monitor traditional workloads or measure the performance of virtualized systems, NETSCOUT’s hardware independent architecture is designed to operate in your environment of choice. We support physical appliances, virtual compute and storage resources on-premises, virtual networking on-premises (SDN/NFV), SDDC, and public, private and Hybrid Cloud.
Product Group

Accelerating Technology Adoption

Virtualization is coming or already underway in your network with Network Function Virtualization/Software-defined Network (NFV/SDN). Long-Term Evolution-Advanced (LTE-A) and 5G are the next mobile technology evolutions in the works.  And the Internet of Things (IoT) is here and is expected to

What is Deep Packet Analysis?

Deep packet analysis or deep packet inspection (DPI) is a type of data processing that inspects the data being sent over a computer network.
